name: Axed
description:
Defend against industrial robots that want to cut you down to use your life as currency! Use your energy to fend off waves of enemies and use their life to build traps and defenses. How many days can you survive before they cut you down?

Game submitted for Ludum Dare 44. The theme was "Your life is a currency."  We built the game around the theme that people cut down trees to sell, so in this game, you defend your life as a tree and use their life to buy power ups for yourself.

Programming by: Brendan (Flamboozle)  - https://twitter.com/flamboozlelol

Art by: Forild -  https://twitter.com/ForildChest

Sound by - Sirzer00
